data.text:
这是我们抵抗的一个月。乌克兰民族、乌克兰人民对俄罗斯的无情入侵的英勇反抗。这是我们抵御毁灭我们的企图的一个月。要把我们夷为平地。俄罗斯军队的原定计划在入侵的头几天就崩溃了。他们以为乌克兰人会害怕。他们认为，乌克兰人不会战斗。嗯，他们错了。

> It's been a month of our resistance. The heroic opposition of the Ukrainian nation, the Ukrainian people, to the merciless invasion of Russia. It's been a month of our defense against attempts to destroy us. To raze us to the ground. The original plan of the Russian military forces fell apart in the first days of the invasion. They thought the Ukrainians would be scared. They believed that the Ukrainians would not fight. Well, they were wrong. 

[Source: Volodymyr Zelenskyy's Telegram Channel](https://t.me/V_Zelenskiy_official/952)
